game.settings.rnk-lobby.lobbyActive.name: Activate Maintenance Lobby
game.settings.rnk-lobby.lobbyActive.hint: When enabled, prevents all players from accessing the world and displays a maintenance message. The lobby state persists across reloads until toggled off.
game.messages.rnk-lobby.maintenance-mess: The world is currently undergoing maintenance. Please stand by while the Game Master prepares for the next session. Access will be restored shortly.
game.notifications.rnk-lobby.lobby-activ: ðŸšª Maintenance Lobby activated. Players are now locked out.
game.notifications.rnk-lobby.lobby-deact: ðŸšª Maintenance Lobby deactivated. Players can now access the world.
game.notifications.rnk-lobby.error: An error occurred while toggling the lobby.
